20110113024443.000|20110113024443.000|CC1| with symptoms of frequent urges
20110113024443.000|20110113024446.000|CC1|    and leaks, day and night.   
20110113024446.000|20110113024446.000|CC1|       If you have certain      
20110113024446.000|20110113024448.000|CC1|  stomach or glaucoma problems, 
20110113024448.000|20110113024448.000|CC1|       or trouble emptying      
20110113024448.000|20110113024450.000|CC1|          your bladder,         
20110113024450.000|20110113024451.000|CC1|      do not take VESIcare.     
20110113024451.000|20110113024451.000|CC1|       VESIcare may cause       
20110113024451.000|20110113024453.000|CC1|       allergic reactions       
20110113024453.000|20110113024454.000|CC1|      that may be serious.      
20110113024454.000|20110113024454.000|CC1|   If you experience swelling   
20110113024454.000|20110113024456.000|CC1|       of the face, lips,       
20110113024456.000|20110113024456.000|CC1|  throat or tongue, stop taking 
20110113024456.000|20110113024459.000|CC1|VESIcare and get emergency help.
20110113024459.000|20110113024501.000|CC1|   Tell your doctor right away  
20110113024501.000|20110113024501.000|CC1|       if you have severe       
20110113024501.000|20110113024502.000|CC1|         abdominal pain         
20110113024502.000|20110113024502.000|CC1|      or become constipated     
20110113024502.000|20110113024505.000|CC1|     for three or more days.    
20110113024505.000|20110113024505.000|CC1|       VESIcare may cause       
20110113024505.000|20110113024507.000|CC1|         blurred vision,        
20110113024507.000|20110113024507.000|CC1|  so use caution while driving  
20110113024507.000|20110113024509.000|CC1|     or doing unsafe tasks.     
20110113024509.000|20110113024509.000|CC1|     Common side effects are    
20110113024509.000|20110113024512.000|CC1|    dry mouth, constipation,    
20110113024512.000|20110113024513.000|CC1|        and indigestion.        
20110113024513.000|20110113024513.000|CC1|            ( woman )           
20110113024513.000|20110113024515.000|CC1| You have better things to join 
20110113024515.000|20110113024515.000|CC1|       than always a line       
20110113024515.000|20110113024518.000|CC1|        for the bathroom.       
20110113024518.000|20110113024518.000|CC1|           So, pipe up

20110113025321.000|20110113025321.000|CC1|      WHILE A BODY IN MOTION    
20110113025321.000|20110113025324.000|CC1|     TENDS TO STN MOTION.       
20110113025324.000|20110113025324.000|CC1|   STAYING ACTIVE CAN ACTUALLY  
20110113025324.000|20110113025327.000|CC1|     EASE ARTHRITIS SYMPTOMS.   
20110113025327.000|20110113025329.000|CC1|    BUT IF YOU HAVE ARTHS,      
20110113025329.000|20110113025329.000|CC1|          STAYING ACTIVE        
20110113025329.000|20110113025331.000|CC1|        CAN BE DIFFICULT.       
20110113025331.000|20110113025331.000|CC1|      PRESCRIPTION CELEBREX     
20110113025331.000|20110113025334.000|CC1| CAN HELP RELIEVE ARTHRITIS PAIN
20110113025334.000|20110113025334.000|CC1|           SO YOUR BODY         
20110113025334.000|20110113025336.000|CC1|       CAN STAY IN MOTION.      
20110113025336.000|20110113025336.000|CC1|         BECAUSE JUST ONE       
20110113025336.000|20110113025339.000|CC1|       200MG CELEBREX A DAY     
20110113025339.000|20110113025341.000|CC1|    CAN PROVIDE OUR RELIEF      
20110113025341.000|20110113025341.000|CC1|   FOR MANY WITH ARTHRITIS PAIN 
20110113025341.000|20110113025343.000|CC1|        AND INFLAMMATION.       
20110113025343.000|20110113025345.000|CC1|    PLUS, IN CLINICAL STUDIES,  
20110113025345.000|20110113025345.000|CC1|  CELEBREX IS PROVEN TO IMPROVE 
20110113025345.000|20110113025348.000|CC1|     DAILY PHYSICAL FUNCTION    
20110113025348.000|20110113025349.000|CC1|       SO MOVING IS ER.         
20110113025349.000|20110113025351.000|CC1| AND CELEBREX IS NOT A NARCOTIC.
20110113025351.000|20110113025351.000|CC1|    WHEN IT COMES TO RELIEVING  
20110113025351.000|20110113025353.000|CC1|       YOUR ARTHRITIS PAIN,     
20110113025353.000|20110113025353.000|CC1|       YOU AND YOUR DOCTOR      
20110113025353.000|20110113025355.000|CC1|   NEED TO BALANCE THE BENEFITS 
20110113025354.000|20110113025354.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 1:22:00 of 1:30:00
20110113025355.000|20110113025356.000|CC1|         WITH THE RISKS.        
20110113025356.000|20110113025356.000|CC1|     ALL PRESCRIPTION NSAIDS,   
20110113025356.000|20110113025359.000|CC1|       INCLUDING CELEBREX,      
20110113025359.000|20110113025359.000|CC1|     MAY INCREASE THE CHANCE    
20110113025359.000|20110113025400.000|CC1|    OF HEART ATTACK OR STROKE,  
20110113025400.000|20110113025402.000|CC1|     WHICH CAN LEAD TO DEATH.   
20110113025402.000|20110113025402.000|CC1|      THIS CHANCE INCREASES     
20110113025402.000|20110113025404.000|CC1|    IF YOU  HEART DISEASE

20110113025410.000|20110113025412.000|CC1|    SKIN OR ALLERGIC REACTIONS

20110113025415.000|20110113025418.000|CC1|   SUCH AS BLEEDING ANN OCCUR W.
20110113025418.000|20110113025418.000|CC1|   PATIENTS ALSO TAKING ASPIRIN 
20110113025418.000|20110113025420.000|CC1|         AND THE ELDERLY        
20110113025420.000|20110113025420.000|CC1|    ARE AT INCREASESK FOR
